lexUnit.name: busy.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: characterized by a high amount of activity.

sentence.text: Once it must have been a familiar sight in Cheltenham ; now the horse drawn carriage looks a little out of place among the busy traffic , snaking it 's way around the towns one-way system .
